title: Play is the work of young children (TEFC)
creator_credit: Crommie and Crommie, David Crommie and Karen Crommie
brief_description: Lenore Wilson discusses her educational philosophy as she is shown working with children in groups and individually. Classroom scenes show the children working on a building project, moving freely around the room and acting out adult roles in their play.
